pullrequest.title: New atlas v5 meshes and materials.

content.raw:
Here's a summary of my issues with the simple shapes.

~~1. Floating thin cylinders above head (looks like they should be offset to match the head cage, negative in X and positive in Z)
2. Flat cylinders on each side of the sensor package
3. Back of the head cage could get shifted over, again in negative Z
4. Backpack collision shape needs to get shifted a bit along the negative X-axis
5. Front collision shapes could probably also get shifted back a tiny bit
6. Cylinder at the very bottom of each hand is unnecessary~~

7. Pelvis should have another shape to capture the cage
content.html:
Here's a summary of my issues with the simple shapes.

1. Floating thin cylinders above head (looks like they should be offset to match the head cage, negative in X and positive in Z) 2. Flat cylinders on each side of the sensor package 3. Back of the head cage could get shifted over, again in negative Z 4. Backpack collision shape needs to get shifted a bit along the negative X-axis 5. Front collision shapes could probably also get shifted back a tiny bit 6. Cylinder at the very bottom of each hand is unnecessary

  1. Pelvis should have another shape to capture the cage
